channel.title: Way to remove grunt gas masks through character_manifest.txt?
channel.description: Is there a code for the character_manifest.txt to have H.E.C.U grunts to spawn without gas masks attached to their helmets?

item.title: Way to remove grunt gas masks through character_manifest.txt?
item.dc:creator: TextFAMGUY1
item.description:
Please don’t make multiple posts. If you have information to add, edit a single post - there’s no need to make 4 consecutive posts like that.

Read full topic

item.title: Way to remove grunt gas masks through character_manifest.txt?
item.dc:creator: Gorgeous_Freeman
item.description:
Though I’m still not sure about that considering that there are parts pertaining to the helmet under the “npc_human_medic” section (helmet_medic). I don’t see anything else like that for grunts.

Read full topic
item.source: Way to remove grunt gas masks through character_manifest.txt?

item.title: Way to remove grunt gas masks through character_manifest.txt?
item.dc:creator: Gorgeous_Freeman
item.description:
The only thing I see that seems possibly related to it in the “npc_human_grunt” codes is “head” under “bodygroup_data”

Read full topic
item.source: Way to remove grunt gas masks through character_manifest.txt?

item.title: Way to remove grunt gas masks through character_manifest.txt?
item.dc:creator: Gorgeous_Freeman
item.description:
Captain Mcderp:

There is a mod on the workshop which uses modified/unused character_manifest stuff to add that sort of things.

I have that mod, but the chances of a grunt spawning like that is actually pretty low. I’d say probably 1 out of every 10 spawns with just a helmet. I went through the file and I’m not sure which code changes that.

Read full topic
